name: The Convolution
description:
A deconstruction of a game that “respects” your time and intelligence.

OVER 12 PUZZLES INSIDE.

This game will not have any menu or pause systems.  PLEASE PLAY BEFORE LOOKIG UP CONTROLS for the "authentic" experience...

Note One: Environment puzzle completion didn't trigger the reward, which broke the experience. File was updated with fix.

--------------------------------------

Control options:

TOUCH!

  •  ARROWS to MOVE
  • EYE to INTERACT with PANELS and AUDIO LOGS
  • TAP ANYWHERE to interact with ENVIRONMENT 

MOUSE!

  • LEFT BUTTON to INTERACT

KEYBOARD!

  • ARROWS to move, complete with GLITCHY WALL VIBRATIONS
  • X to INTERACT with PANELS and AUDIO LOGS

Thank you for playing this little guy. Tear into it if you wish. One might say this game... BLOWS.

Thanks most of all to my 5-year-old who went out of his way to utterly destroy the game in question.
